description: Temporary Work Permit (Closed/LMIA or Exempt). Note: LMIA validity periods have been reduced.

meta.fee_euro_approx: 155 CAD (Work Permit) + 85 CAD (Biometrics) + 100 CAD (Open Permit - if applicable)
meta.processing_time_standard: 12-20 Weeks (India to Canada). LMIA processing varies.
meta.max_stay: 1-2 Years (LMIA validity) or up to 3 Years (Exempt)
meta.passport_validity: Must be valid for the entire duration of the contract
meta.min_funds_requirement: **Proof of Funds:** Not mandatory if you have a valid Job Offer, but highly recommended to show **~CAD 5,000** for initial settlement.

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Scanned copies of all pages. Validity must cover the entire work duration.

documents.title: LMIA Copy (Labour Market Impact Assessment)
documents.description: **Track A (Closed):** Positive LMIA letter provided by your employer. It must list your name or be an 'Unnamed' LMIA matched to you.

documents.title: Offer of Employment Number (A#)
documents.description: **Track B (Exempt):** The 'A-Number' (e.g., A1234567) generated when the employer submits the offer in the Employer Portal.

documents.title: Job Offer Letter
documents.description: Signed contract on company letterhead detailing: Salary (must match LMIA), Hours (min 30/week), and Duties.

documents.title: Proof of Qualifications
documents.description: Evidence you can do the job: Education Degrees + Previous Work Experience Letters (to match the NOC code requirements).

documents.title: Upfront Medical Exam
documents.description: Required for jobs in health/childcare or if residing in India (designated country). Book with a Panel Physician.

steps_flow.title: Employer Secures Authorization
steps_flow.description:
You cannot start without the employer's input.
* **LMIA Stream:** Employer applies to ESDC (pay CAD 1000). Wait for 'Positive LMIA'.
* **Exempt Stream:** Employer submits offer in the 'Employer Portal' (pay CAD 230).

steps_flow.title: Create IRCC Account
steps_flow.description:
Log in to GCKey/IRCC Portal.
* **Select:** 'Work Permit' -> 'Outside Canada'.
* **Input:** Enter the LMIA Number or the Offer of Employment Number (A#).

steps_flow.title: Upload & Pay
steps_flow.description:
Upload documents (PDF < 4MB).
* **Fees:** Pay CAD 155 (Work Permit) + CAD 85 (Biometrics). Open Permit holders pay +CAD 100.

steps_flow.title: Biometrics & Passport
steps_flow.description:
Book VFS appointment after receiving the BIL letter.
* **Wait:** ~12-20 weeks.
* **Submit:** Passport to VFS upon request (PPR). Receive the **'Port of Entry (POE) Letter of Introduction'**.

steps_flow.title: Arrival & Issuance
steps_flow.description:
**Critical:** The visa in your passport is just for entry. 
* **Action:** At the Canadian airport, show your POE Letter + Job Offer to the Officer.
* **Receive:** They will print the actual **Work Permit** (paper document). Check the expiry date immediately.
